edge_1: Jared and Kyle move to kill Wanderer
edge_2: Doc has been experimenting with ways to remove Souls and allow the host's mind to regain control, resulting in the deaths of many Souls and hosts. After isolating herself for several days, Wanderer learns about Doc's experiments.
edge_3: Jeb captures Seeker, but Wanderer offers to show Doc how to properly remove Souls on the condition that he later removes her from Melanie's body.

edge_1: Jared and Kyle move to kill Wanderer
edge_2: Doc has been experimenting with ways to remove Souls and allow the host's mind to regain control, resulting in the deaths of many Souls and hosts. After isolating herself for several days, Wanderer learns about Doc's experiments.
edge_3: Doc uses the technique to remove Seeker from her host, with both host and Soul surviving.

edge_1: Jared and Kyle move to kill Wanderer
edge_2: Tired of the many lives she’s lived and finding it too painful to leave everyone behind, Wanderer makes Doc promise to let her die when she is removed and not tell anyone.
edge_3: Jeb captures Seeker, but Wanderer offers to show Doc how to properly remove Souls on the condition that he later removes her from Melanie's body.

edge_1: Jared and Kyle move to kill Wanderer
edge_2: The fact that both Wanderer and a Soul with this group have sided with the human resistance suggests that there may be more Souls who will do so.
edge_3: The humans reveal that a Soul with this group has sided with the human resistance, implying that there are other Souls who may do the same.

edge_1: Doc has been experimenting with ways to remove Souls and allow the host's mind to regain control, resulting in the deaths of many Souls and hosts. After isolating herself for several days, Wanderer learns about Doc's experiments.
edge_2: Jeb captures Seeker, but Wanderer offers to show Doc how to properly remove Souls on the condition that he later removes her from Melanie's body.
edge_3: Wanderer takes Seeker’s tiny alien form to a Soul space-travel site, where she sends it so far from Earth that it can not return for numerous generations.
